entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 11:58 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
